item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Labor Day Weekend is coming up and it's time to party.

Please join Tina and the rest of us on SUNDAY, September 2 to celebrate Labor Day and also to help a friend in need.

Many of you know Jill and know that she's been fighting metastatic breast cancer for over two years now.

As you can imagine, this has taken a toll on her financially.  I never charge for any of my parties, but I'd like to ask everyone to contribute $10 each at this event . . .  and if you can afford more, additional donations will certainly be accepted.

ALL THE MONIES raised will go to Jill to assist her with her medical bills, prescriptions, transportation to Yale, etc.

This will be one of our traditional get togethers -- bring something for the table and your beverage of choice.

We'll have a badminton/v-ball net set up, the dance music will be playing, a fire pit in the evening and maybe Ken can put together some fireworks. (Al also still has some of Evan's Fireworks and here is a good reason to use some of em up).

Please RSVP on this site and pass this invite along to others who may also know Jill.

----------------------------------------------------

Driving Directions and GPS/Map address will be sent out as needed via separate e mail for those that do not know it or forgot it.

General Landmark Location: MERIDEN CT near Intersection of: I-91 & rte 5 / 15
item.how_to_find_us: I will place a 6 foot ORANGE POLE in the front yard when i get there.

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: SUNDAY SEPT 2 -- FUNDRAISER FOR A FRIEND
